notes.text:
This update for libaom fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2021-30475: Fixed buffer overflow in aom_dsp/noise_model.c (bsc#1189497).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: aom_dsp/noise_model.c in libaom in AOMedia before 2021-03-24 has a buffer overflow.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
